definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
commodity grain (grain produced as a commodity rather than for self-sufficiency)

sentences.english: The truck was freighted with commercial goods.
sentences.chinese: 這輛卡車上裝滿了商品。

sentences.english: A key part of the program hasbeen to commercialize outstanding health science technologies from themedical colleges.
sentences.chinese: 專業的核心是將醫學院校的生命科學技術商品化。

sentences.english: Ji rummages for fake or substandard goods in shops.
sentences.chinese: 紀萬昌在商店裏搜尋假商品或不合格的商品。

sentences.english: Ji rummages for fake or substandard goods in shops.
sentences.chinese: 紀萬昌在商店裏搜尋假商品或不合格的商品。

sentences.english: Large market with small commodity is the blue-chip feature of its regional economy.
sentences.chinese: 小商品，大市場，區域經濟各顯神通。

sentences.english: It is unclear how the stores procure the Apple merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 目前還不清楚這些商店是如何獲得蘋果的商品。

sentences.english: The total lignans content of Dysosma versipellis is related to the habitat.
sentences.chinese: 商品八角蓮總木脂素含量則與產地有較大關係。

sentences.english: The law of value is determined by socially necessary labour time.
sentences.chinese: 價值規律是商品價值由社會必要勞動時間決定的規律。

sentences.english: Even my preferred product is currently out-of-stock , I am still loyal to the website.
sentences.chinese: 即使我喜愛的商品暫時缺貨，我仍然會忠誠於此網站。
產品滯銷商品過剩意味什麼？

sentences.english: Goods of that quality will never sell.
sentences.chinese: 這樣質量的商品絕對賣不出去。

sentences.english: To manage the numbers of organizing institutions and the bar code of the products within the whole city.
sentences.chinese: 管理全市組織機構代碼和商品條碼工作。

sentences.english: In a big department store， there are numerous departments selling different kinds of goods.
sentences.chinese: 大百貨公司裏有許多部門分售各類商品。

sentences.english: So much for corporate rhetoric about adding value to commoditized products.
sentences.chinese: 如此多的公司都高談闊論着增加商品價值的花言巧語。

sentences.english: Most stores will allow the purchaser to exchange goods.
sentences.chinese: 大多數商店將允許顧客更換商品。

sentences.english: Hexi corridor was named one of the commodity grain base in China and granary bam of Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 河西走廊被譽爲甘肅的糧倉和全國的商品糧基地之一。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
